product_name: FCS Stand Up Paddleboard Touring Fin - 9 in.
long_description: Zigzagging your way across the lake can get awfully tiring when you're out for a long session on your paddleboard. The Surf Hardware FCS touring fin helps you track straight and save energy. Put this touring fin on your surf-oriented board for straighter tracking when paddling on flatwater. Surf Hardware FCS Stand Up Paddleboard touring fin measures approximately 9 in. and weighs 10.3 oz. Compatible for installation in all US long boxes, found in virtually all stand up paddleboards, with an Allen key screw (Allen key included).
short_description: Zigzagging your way across the lake can get awfully tiring when you're out for a long session on your paddleboard. The Surf Hardware FCS touring fin helps you track straight and save energy.
